title: Google\Cloud\Billing\Budgets\V1beta1\LastPeriodAmount
name: LastPeriodAmount
description:
Describes a budget amount targeted to the last [Filter.calendar_period][google.cloud.billing.budgets.v1beta1.Filter.calendar_period] spend. At this time, the amount is automatically 100% of the last calendar period's spend; that is, there are no other options yet.

Future configuration options will be described here (for example, configuring a percentage of last period's spend). LastPeriodAmount cannot be set for a budget configured with a [Filter.custom_period][google.cloud.billing.budgets.v1beta1.Filter.custom_period].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.billing.budgets.v1beta1.LastPeriodAmount

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.
